name: Hectic Spectrum
description:
Hectic Spectrum is a game that was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. 

The goal of the game is to beat all 15 levels and get the highest score possible, but you only have 60 SECONDS.

The map is filled with different colors and you as a player can swap between them and if the colors match your speed is raised.

The game is really tough but offers tons of ways to improve your skill.

I want to thank "TNTC"(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTR740iIPwfu7Pz_BoCEJ-g) and "MIX AND JAM"(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLyVUwlB_Hahir_VsKkGPIA) for their great tutorials and github repository on the shaders that this game uses to color the floor.
